# registerSubclass(_:as:name:version:)

**Type Method**

Registers an audio unit subclass.

## Declaration

```swift
class func registerSubclass(_ cls: AnyClass, as componentDescription: AudioComponentDescription, name: String, version: UInt32)
```

## Parameters

- **cls**: An [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit] subclass.
- **componentDescription**: The component to register.
- **name**: The component’s name, using the convention `<manufacturer name>:<audio unit name>`.
- **version**: The component’s version.

## Discussion

This method dynamically registers the supplied [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit] subclass with the Audio Component system, in the context of the current process only. After you’ve registered the subclass, instantiate it by calling one of the following:

- The [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/init(componentDescription:)] method.
- The [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/init(componentDescription:options:)] method.
- The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnit] [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnit/instantiate(with:options:completionHandler:)] method.
- The [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioComponentInstanceNew(_:_:)] function.

## Customizing the Audio Unit Behavior

- **shouldChange(to:for:)**: This is called when you set the format on a bus.
- **setRenderResourcesAllocated(_:)**: Sets the Boolean value of the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/renderResourcesAllocated] property.
- **internalRenderBlock**: The block which you must provide, via a getter, in order to implement rendering.
- **midiOutputBufferSizeHint**
- **AUInternalRenderBlock**: A block to render the audio unit.
